meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Woloshen Anita Dorsett Santina Lonergan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1724.

td.p: Dan Woloshen, a lawyer originally from Peabody, Massachusetts
Anita Dorsett, an information management director from Houston, Texas
Santina Lonergan, a secondary teacher from Scranton, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,401)

tr.td: NOTORIOUS
CARD GAMES
BIBLICAL QUOTES
COFFEE
DIOR
"MILK"
